ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
16 whole graham crackers, broken into two square halves

cookingTips: Whisk pudding mix and cold milk until smooth, then let set 2 minutes
Layer graham crackers, pudding, and peanut butter in alternating layers
Freeze until firm, at least 4 hours, for clean slicing
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide on achieving proper pudding consistency and building layers that hold together when frozen and sliced.
